com.metaio.sdk
Class ARViewFragmentActivity

java.lang.Object
  android.content.Context
      android.content.ContextWrapper
          android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
              android.app.Activity
                  android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
                      com.metaio.sdk.ARViewFragmentActivity
All Implemented Interfaces:
ComponentCallbacks, ComponentCallbacks2, KeyEvent.Callback, LayoutInflater.Factory, LayoutInflater.Factory2, View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, View.OnTouchListener, Window.Callback, MetaioSurfaceView.Callback
Direct Known Subclasses:
ARELFragmentActivity
public abstract class ARViewFragmentActivity
extends FragmentActivity
implements MetaioSurfaceView.Callback, View.OnTouchListener

This is base activity to use metaio SDK. It creates metaio GLSurfaceView and handle all its callbacks and lifecycle.

onSurfaceCreated

public void onSurfaceCreated()
This function will be called, right after the OpenGL context was created. All calls to metaio SDK must be done after this callback has been triggered.

Specified by:
onSurfaceCreated in interface MetaioSurfaceView.Callback
See Also:
getAudioRenderer

onDrawFrame

public void onDrawFrame()
Description copied from interface: MetaioSurfaceView.Callback
This is called when metaio SDK should render next frame. The callback implementation must call IMetaioSDK.render() to update.

Specified by:
onDrawFrame in interface MetaioSurfaceView.Callback

onSurfaceDestroyed

public void onSurfaceDestroyed()
Description copied from interface: MetaioSurfaceView.Callback
Called when OpenGL surface is destroyed

Specified by:
onSurfaceDestroyed in interface MetaioSurfaceView.Callback

onSurfaceChanged

public void onSurfaceChanged(int width,
                             int height)
Description copied from interface: MetaioSurfaceView.Callback
Called when OpenGL surface is resized. The new dimensions must be passed to metaioSDK by calling metaioSDK.resizeRenderer.

Specified by:
onSurfaceChanged in interface MetaioSurfaceView.Callback
Parameters:
width - Width of the surface view
height - Height of the surface view
